### Installing


```sh
yarn add darksadasyt-anime
```

or

```sh
npm i darksadasyt-anime
```

## üçü Usage <a name="usage"></a>

```ts
const { search, getep, dl } = require('darksadasyt-anime')
```


## Anime search üé≠

```ts

(async () => {
const results = await search('naruto');
console.log(results)
})();
```
```ts
[
  {
    title: 'Boruto: Naruto Next Generations',
    link: 'https://animeheaven.me/anime.php?t2py4'
  },
  { title: 'Naruto', link: 'https://animeheaven.me/anime.php?ukr6y' },
  {
    title: 'Naruto Shippuden',
    link: 'https://animeheaven.me/anime.php?nc7bk'
  }
]
```

## Get epishodes and details üé≠
```ts
(async () => {
const results = await getep('https://animeheaven.me/anime.php?yk4t2');                                                                                         return console.log(results);
})();
```
```ts
{
  result: {
    title: 'Ameku M.D. Doctor Detective',
    image: 'https://animeheaven.me/image.php?azuzh',
    date: '2025-?',
    epishodes: '7+',
    imdb: '7.2/10'
  },
  results: [
    {
      episode: '7',
      url: 'episode.php?fec4ca647769ab4180c33ad36fbc109a'
    },
    {
      episode: '6',
      url: 'episode.php?4a23c8bedd599609c675359d87de3fa3'
    },
    {
      episode: '5',
      url: 'episode.php?467562558ba291b7ba8568199c3e5f2b'
    },
    {
      episode: '4',
      url: 'episode.php?1138f3aa93c3f0710d3d018a6244aa99'
    },
    {
      episode: '3',
      url: 'episode.php?147da3439f109dc8a933d8f36851acb7'
    },
    {
      episode: '2',
      url: 'episode.php?451b4ea7830c5ade17c85ef04bdc2959'
    },
    {
      episode: '1',
      url: 'episode.php?3f5d3d2844d33c8d11cb58efa03f3f51'
    }
  ]
}
```

## Download anime üé≠

```ts
(async () => {
const results = await dl('https://animeheaven.me/episode.php?82469e2ef4034594cfd2d64ff7b7c819');                                                                           console.log(results);
})();
```
```ts
[
  'episode.php?4d47c8a1841304af419bbd717c5eb1ed',
  'episode.php?98b1ad5a0a9ccb603a9f9aba197e3b03',
  'https://e5.animeheaven.me/video.mp4?82469e2ef4034594cfd2d64ff7b7c819&d'
]
```
